thread.title: Transaction in Own Shares

title: Transaction in Own Shares
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 31, 2015, 16:26 BST - UK Markets close in 4 mins. Transaction in Own Shares 
HARGREAVE HALE AIM VCT1 PLC 
31 July 2015 
Purchase of shares for cancellation 
Hargreave Hale AIM VCT1 plc announces today that the company purchased 95,000 Ordinary shares at a price of 72.276 pence per share for cancellation. 
Following the purchase and cancellation of the above shares, 47,742,811 ordinary shares of 1p each will remain in issue. 
For further information please contact: Stuart Brookes Hargreave Hale AIM VCT1 plc 01253 754740 View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150731005546/en/ Contact Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
